name: Friday Night Funkin' Chart Editor Save File

screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .fnfc file in Friday Night Funkin' 0.3
screenshot.caption: FNFC file open in Friday Night Funkin' 0.3

description: Friday Night Funkin' is a music rhythm game in which players engage in rap battles against various opponents to prove their worth and emerge victorious. Each level provides different song challenges that players must complete to advance to the next level.
You can open a song's music chart in the Chart Editor when playing a song in Friday Night Funkin'. After opening the Chart Editor, you can modify the notes, instruments, and other metadata .

images.caption: FNFC file open in Friday Night Funkin' 0.3
